column4: I am in an attempt to remove Windows 7 from my hard drive and have ubuntu running as the only os on the hard drive but i do not want to damage any of the mods i've made to ubuntu thus far. Just looking for a second opinion but will this information help me in removing windows 7 and regaining the hard drive space with it? https://help.ubuntu.com/community/HowtoPartition/ReformattingPartition
do i just remove the ntfs partitions? will that give me hard drive space back ?
you can just format that partition and use it as storage.
